title: Got to level 8 on and unlocked flash+teleport and runes. Next day I'm level 6 again?
body:
I recently got back into league and started a new account. I rushed levelling to 8 to get flash and teleport and get some flexibility in runes. The next day I logged in and tried selecting flash but it said there was an error. I closed and reopened the client and now I'm back to level 6, with flash and teleport not unlocked anymore and also not able to choose runes. I don't know if I should keep levelling the account if I'll just keep getting reset back to level 6.

Anyone know of a potential cause/fix for this?

replies.body: Happened to me today... level 26 down to 22
